name: Tricky Bike Stunts
description:
Welcome to the new world of best motorcycle racing game and stunts biking adventure where you experience a unique levels crazy flips realest physics extreme stunts. You gone simply love this bike racer with amazing desert roads. Get this extreme motorbike rider game free from play store and enjoy. Tricky Bike Stunts having impossible tracks challenging racetrack tricky obstacles bumps and jumps and many more hurdles. Once you clear the challenging level on time you get extra coins from which you select dirt motorbike and sports bikes of your own choice.

Features:
• Trial Bike Stunts
• Fully functioning speed action
• Freestyle Motorcycle Fun
• Realistic bike stunts graphics with tricky bike trail stunt
• Addictive racing gameplay
• Historic bike flip
• Impossible transformer race with crazy tracks
• Simple and intuitive driver controls
• Obstacles stunt challenge
• Amazing stunt challenge features
